body_html:
Only fft, ifft, rift, irfft for now. But with the bindings to cufft and MKL added, implementing others will be much easier in future.

body:
Only fft, ifft, rift, irfft for now. But with the bindings to cufft and MKL
added, implementing others will be much easier in future.

On Sun, Mar 25, 2018 at 12:48 Brandon Dube <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Beggars can't be choosers, but will these PRs bring in only functions like
> fft, fft2, etc, or will there also be fftshift / ifftshift?
>
> —
